previewArticle.title: Columbus Crew vs. Philadelphia Union | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Columbus Crew 2, Philadelphia Union 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Columbus Crew look to move ahead of Sporting KC with a win against the Philadelphia Union in their regular season finale.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Columbus Crew vs. Philadelphia Union | October 26, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Cristian Maidana (Philadelphia Union) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Cristian Maidana misses just wide early against the Crew

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jairo Arrieta.

timelineItems.desc: Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the center of the box.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Jairo Arrieta hits the bar with his first shot

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: Fast breaks galore and stout, well-positioned #defense in #transition from both teams. Still 0-0 here in Columbus. #Crew96 #CLBvsPHI

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: 9' Off corner kick Wenger gets head on ball that bounces towards Le Toux but ball rolls out before Le Toux' cross. Scoreless. #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: Jon Bentley
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 pressuring high to avoid play-in game. #DOOP pressing high because.. why not? End to end stuff so far.

timelineItems.comment: Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) hits the bar with a left footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Waylon Francis with a cross.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Columbus Crew 1, Philadelphia Union 0. Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Jairo Arrieta breaks free and gives the Crew a lead

timelineItems.name: Kaitlyn McGoldrick
timelineItems.text: Finally an Arrieta goal where his flirting with the offside line paid off... About time #Crew96

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 break from the top of their own box, and Arrieta calmly rounds MacMath for the opening goal.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: Who needs Federico Higuain when you have Ben Speas. Impressive playmaking ability. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Stephan & TT
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!!!! 1-0 #ColumbusCrew #Crew96 #CLBvsPHI

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Arrieta goes one-on-one with MacMath to give @ColumbusCrew an early lead. #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: I think Wil Trapp has a case for a secondary assist on that Arrieta goal. We'll see what Opta says. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: The Crew is 10-1-2 when scoring first this season. Not included in there: a 3-2 win at Philadelphia two weeks ago. #crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ben Speas (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Héctor Jiménez.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 16' Patient possession by Parkhurst & Speas. #Crew96 clearly trying to control #tempo here as Union's disjointed D out of its element. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 16’ Great cross from Williams but Parkhurst heads away. #DOOP

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Waylon Francis.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Opta is saying no secondary assist for Wil Trapp. Shame. It was a nice breakout pass to Speas, very quickly started. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Ben Speas (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 18' Another Union #corner from Maidana easily deflected for a skimmed clear by Tchani. #Crew96 looking strong & coordinated. #MLS #CLBvsPHI

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Union are a mess in the back right now. Crew players are able to just dribble around on the outside of the 18 whenever they want.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Cristián Maidana (Philadelphia Union) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Danny Cruz.
Foul by Ben Speas (Columbus Crew).
Amobi Okugo (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Reminder: team awards come after the match. If Finlay notches a goal or an assist, he'll clinch the club's Budweiser Golden Boot. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Columbus Crew 2, Philadelphia Union 1.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: So I hear Oden is in the building, but the bigger news is that so is Mark Titus, who is a #Crew96 season ticket holder?! Awesome.

timelineItems.name: Jon Bentley
timelineItems.text: If #Crew96 win here, that KC-NY game tonight will be fun. Both teams will fight like crazy to stay out of the wild card/avoid playing away.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: Arrieta: the early goal and two chances created already. Has looked dangerous all afternoon. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew).
Sheanon Williams (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 23’ Maurice Edu just bailed out teammate Ethan White who whiffed on a clearance. #DOOP

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: 25' Edu breaks up a similar run from Arrieta in which he nabbed his first goal. Edu recognized and broke up the play. #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: 26' into the game, #Crew96 have 7 shots, Union 1

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 25' Trapp sinking deep into central defensive position, aftmost player in front of Clark. #Crew96 CBs even playing wide. Deliberate scheme.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Sebastien Le Toux (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Sebastien Le Toux's quick shot is saved by Steve Clark

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 28': Wenger with a chance for #doop. Header inside the box from about eight yards out is just wide of the post.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Possession barely in #Crew96 favor right now- 50.9%- 49.1%

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Wenger flicks a header JUST wide. One of the Union's first really dangerous attacks.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Sebastien Le Toux (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Raymon Gaddis with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 28’ Great cross from the left and Wenger puts a click on header that goes just wide. Union coming closer. Clark then makes a save. #DOOP

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 28': Clark makes the save on a low shot from Le Toux, who turned and shot from inside the box near the top of the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Since the goal, #Crew96 still dominating play but #PhilaUnion increasingly finding a footing in the game.

timelineItems.comment: Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sebastien Le Toux (Philadelphia Union).
Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 31': Trapp takes a knock via a foul by Le Toux near the #Crew96 bench. The Vice Captain is up and is back in action immediately.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 32' Philly suddenly playing a lot more physically, Cruz with a challenge in the attacking 1/3, #Crew96 lands possession. #CLBvsPHI #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union).
Michael Parkhurst (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Guldan
timelineItems.text: Union (all teams really) can press for only so long. #Crew96 also being very patient in the buildup.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Philly cross in the box, Cruz goes up for the head and knocked over Francis. Looked to be a foul in my opinion, but no call. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: This game has gotten really weird. Crew aren't handling the Philly press as well as they were, and passing has been VERY sloppy.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Tony Tchani.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 37’ That’s the second time Francis has completely muffed a cross. As @AndrewKingMLS says, a little rusty. #crew96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Amobi Okugo (Philadelphia Union).
Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Richard Jaffa
timelineItems.text: Commanding goalkeeping from #Clark as the 'Steve says NO' chants ensue! #Crew96 #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: Brett Stewart
timelineItems.text: Thani has been excellent thus far on defending corners #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Patrick Guldan
timelineItems.text: Clark dealing with extreme sun to start the game as the #Crew96 attack the south. I had a small hope that he’d doff the cap.

timelineItems.name: Steve Holroyd
timelineItems.text: Enjoy Zac MacMath's last @PhilaUnion appearance before he is exposed in the expansion draft #CLBvPHI #DOOP

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jairo Arrieta with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 4': Arrieta crosses into the box and Finlay has a go on the volley. It's blocked by Philadelphia, but a nice opportunity for #Crew96.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: Clark unafraid to make plays with his hands, Union threatening as he #Crew96 attack has completely fallen off as the half draws to a close.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Philadelphia Union. Cristián Maidana tries a through ball, but Sebastien Le Toux is caught offside.
Foul by Héctor Jiménez (Columbus Crew).
Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Steve Clark makes a diving save after great ball movement by the Union

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sebastien Le Toux.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 on the board first as Arrieta slips behind the @PhilaUnion back line: http://t.co/YHjbaKKwt1

timelineItems.name: Massive Report
timelineItems.text: 41' The Union put on a show with 1 or 2-touch passes in the #Crew96 area. Cruz hits a shot from the top of the box & Clark dives to catch.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Up a goal and already in the playoffs, Crew are looking a little complacent. Lots of ball-watching and jogging. Berhalter won't be pleased.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 looking like a gifted underachiever that cruises; the #Union more the motivated hard worker that grinds out success. #CLBvsPHI 1-0

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrew Wenger (Philadelphia Union).
Ben Speas (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Whenever #Crew96 have a poor game or even half, Berhalter points to slow ball movement as a reason. He'd surely say that about the last 25'.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 44' Throw-in from Jiménez leads to a scuffle for possession in front of Philly's bench. #Crew96 looking content to let #Union come to them.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 45'+: One minute of first-half stoppage time will be added. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Philadelphia Union
timelineItems.text: HALFTIME: @PhilaUnion with added pressure late in first, but it's @ColumbusCrew with 1-0 lead. Second half coming up. http://t.co/zc4dfv5ybv

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Columbus Crew 1, Philadelphia Union 0.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 lead 1-0 at the half. First 15-20 minutes were all Crew, and Union looked like they could concede 10. Since then, disjointed+messy.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Halftime stats and more from Crew Stadium: http://t.co/WKYfmQ39mc

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: At the half, the Union have 51.4% of the possession. #Crew96 up 7-4 on shots.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Difference between the Crew right now and the Crew in the summer: In the midst of a tough game,they capitalized on a chance & they're up 1-0

timelineItems.name: Jim Sell
timelineItems.text: Greg Oden in the @Nordecke! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Evonne Segall
timelineItems.text: Ricardo Irribarren is sitting about 10 rows up from me, with... Oh. Um, that's Federico Higuain. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Thank you, from #Crew96. WATCH: http://t.co/Ryl2A69KU9

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: Second half is underway from Crew Stadium. Sun hanging low in the sky, shadows will be tough this half. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Bryan Lear
timelineItems.text:
Frankie and Emma!
#Crew96

timelineItems.name: Philadelphia Union
timelineItems.text: Second half is underway. Be sure to follow #CLBvPHI via @TheUMatchDay

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Second half has begun, and the sun is going to be a factor. Should be in #Crew96 favor.

timelineItems.name: Massive Report
timelineItems.text: 46' Le Toux gets in behind the #Crew96 defense and his shot is saved by Clark. Flag goes up for offside.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: And Clark has to make a save not even a minute in. So much for that halftime energy I guess. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Columbus Crew 1, Philadelphia Union 0.
Offside, Philadelphia Union. Sheanon Williams tries a through ball, but Sebastien Le Toux is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Waylon Francis with a cross.
Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Amobi Okugo (Philadelphia Union).
Maurice Edu (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Finlay runs into Edu and is down. Foul is called on Finlay, but I'm not sure how. Edu basically set a pick. Obstruction if anything #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Union playing a very bold high line right now. I think there's a certain Crew winger who might be pleased with that.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Wiebe
timelineItems.text: Did the UniMas announcers just reveal @Dannycruz5's middle name is Quimby? As in mayor of Springfield Quimby? #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: 49' Finlay looks for call after collision with Edu. but good no-call from ref to give ball to Union. Crew lead, 1-0. #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Maurice Edu (Philadelphia Union) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Cristián Maidana.
Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Tony Tchani.
Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Héctor Jiménez.
Attempt saved. Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Andrew Wenger with a cross.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: 51’ Chance for the Union, Cruz re-directs a cross on goal with his head but Clark makes a diving stop. Still 1-0 Crew. #crew96 #DOOP

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: 51' Cruz with header on goal inside box but right at Clark. Union still pushing for equalizer with tons of pressure behind ball. #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: Jenna Schmidt
timelineItems.text: #crew96 http://t.co/EBSryjHUO0

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Michael Parkhurst (Columbus Crew).
Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: 54' Cruz takes hit from Parkhurst and goes down, free kick Union at corner of Crew box. #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Parkhurst, coming up off the ground, runs over Cruz to give Philly a dangerous free kick. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: celestemdesigns25
timelineItems.text: Fan shadows awaiting the game at crew stadium! @columbuscrew #crew #soccer #columbuscrew #Crew96 #celestemphotography #celestemstyle

timelineItems.name: Jarrod Kapp
timelineItems.text:
Field level seats tonight!!
#crew96

timelineItems.desc: Amobi Okugo (Philadelphia Union) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Amobi Okugo sees yellow for a rough challenge

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Amobi Okugo (Philadelphia Union).
Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: 55' Looping cross from Maidana into #Crew96 area just misses Carroll back post. #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: Lindsey
timelineItems.text: #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 1': #Crew96 in all-gold, headed toward the south goal in the first half. Meram and Speas kick-off and we're underway!

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Steve Clark gets his own. #crew96 http://t.co/Bk42I1Smjh

timelineItems.name: ally
timelineItems.text: #crew96 @columbuscrew #newcrew #ccsc

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Berhalter getting some love from the Nordecke with a large tifo. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 56' #CAUTION as Amobi Okugo receives a #yellowcard in space challenging and taking down Tchani. 1st #booking of game. 1-0, #Crew96 leads.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Jimenez with an excellent pass to Finlay, who crosses it in the box, but not enough yellow there to make anything of it. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Tony Tchani.
Attempt blocked. Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sheanon Williams (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Richard Jaffa
timelineItems.text: Sloppy start to the game from #Crew96 in a game they could really do with winning to ensure they miss out on the extra playoff game. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Philadelphia Union. Maurice Edu tries a through ball, but Sebastien Le Toux is caught offside.
Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Ethan White (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: Good job by @MikeServedio to get 1 of the 6 TVs in the PPL Park media room turned to the Union game. This is their home stadium, I've heard.

timelineItems.name: Griffin Lammers
timelineItems.text: Crew game. #Crew96 #daretobemassive

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Arrieta is still down after colliding with Edu, Finlay, and MacMath on a ball at the top of the box. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Jairo Arrieta down after a collision with Maurice Edu, and he's about to be subbed out for Romain Gall. #crew96

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Jairo Arrieta (Columbus Crew) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: And Romain Gall comes in for an apparently injured Jairo Arrieta in the 63rd minute. Not sure what the Crew shape will be now.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Amobi Okugo (Philadelphia Union) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sheanon Williams.
Foul by Pedro Ribeiro (Philadelphia Union).
Michael Parkhurst (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Zac MacMath makes a diving stop on Waylon Francis' long range effort

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Looks like Berhalter is resting people now. Up 1-0, he's now substituted Jairo Arrieta and Ethan Finlay. Still 25 to play.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Amobi Okugo (Philadelphia Union).
Ben Speas (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Waylon Francis (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Tony Tchani.
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Ethan White.
Delay in match Pedro Ribeiro (Philadelphia Union) because of an injury.
Attempt saved. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Héctor Jiménez.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Ouch. Pedro Ribeiro just got a big face full of the back of Eric Gehrig's head. Gehrig is fine, of course, but Ribeiro is down and shaken up

timelineItems.name: Tom Lillis IV
timelineItems.text: 4th official sitting on these #Crew96 subs for so long he could work for the Post Office. #whileWeAreYoung ⚽️

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 69': Gehrig and Ribeiro collide in the box and Ribeiro is still down and being evaluated by the athletic training staff.

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt saved. Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Ethan White.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 73': SAVE, Clark! Steve Clark stops a powerful blast from Danny Cruz inside the box.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Clark doin all sorts of Clarky things. #Crew96 still clinging on to that 1-0 lead in the 73'

timelineItems.comment: Romain Gall (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ethan White (Philadelphia Union).
Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Ethan White.
Attempt missed. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ben Speas with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: Zach Pfeffer has now played in the Union's season finale in all three seasons he's been in MLS. #MrOctober

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 78' Anor coming in for Speas. Could be the burst #Crew96 needs. #substitution #CLBvsPHI #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bernardo Anor (Columbus Crew).
Zach Pfeffer (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Wil Trapp.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: 16,892 announced in Crew Stadium tonight. Officially breaks the club attendance record.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Maurice Edu (Philadelphia Union) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Cristián Maidana with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 16,892 here at #CrewStadium today. All-time season-long record of #attendance set in 1999 thereby broken in 2014. #MLS #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Michael Parkhurst (Columbus Crew).
Sebastien Le Toux (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Zach Pfeffer (Philadelphia Union).
Corner,  Philadelphia Union. Conceded by Michael Parkhurst.

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 84': CHANCE - Gehrig finds space for a cross to Gall, but Williams steps in to force a corner. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Gehrig cross is knocked out for a #Crew96 corner. Excellent counter run

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Columbus Crew 1, Philadelphia Union 1. Zach Pfeffer (Philadelphia Union) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Zach Pfeffer taps in Amobi Okugo's pass

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Sheanon Williams.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 83' I can't believe how many corners Philly's taken. Good shot saved by Clark, Gehrig fast break & cross defended by Williams. 1-0 #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Héctor Jiménez (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Raymon Gaddis (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Anthony Spatola
timelineItems.text: Somebody named Zach Pfeffer just scored a goal for the Union. The world is going to end. #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: GOAL UNION! Pfeffer nutmegs Clark to score and even this match 1-1 for @philaunion. Pfeffer gets his first @MLS goal! #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: The Union equalizes as Okugo finds Pfeffer to make it 1-1. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Zach Pfeffer draws the Union level. That goal had been coming for probably 60 minutes. #Crew96 have three minutes to find a winner.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Okugo finds Pfeffer to pull one back for @PhilaUnion. 1-1 with less than 5 to play. #CLBvPHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Michael Parkhurst following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Columbus Crew 2, Philadelphia Union 1. Bernardo Anor (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from very close range to the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bernardo Anor taps in to seal the win for the Crew

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Sebastien Le Toux (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 89': Gehrig finds space from a tight angle, but his shot at a winner is wide. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Waylon Francis.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: The 2014 Columbus Crew, destroying reporters' first and second drafts all season long. 2-1 in Columbus.

timelineItems.name: Clayton Trainor
timelineItems.text: 91st MINUTE STUNNER!!! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Dave Zeitlin
timelineItems.text: The Union giving up a goal at the death to drop points is a fitting way to end the season, I guess.

timelineItems.name: Matt Digby
timelineItems.text: #CREW96 GOAL IN THE 90TH MINUTE! 2-1 LEAD OVER THE UNION!!!!

timelineItems.name: Kevin Murphy Jr
timelineItems.text: Like that we are back into the lead! Gggooooooaaaaaallllllll!! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: pharmy1917
timelineItems.text: I LOVE THIS TEAM #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schwepfinger
timelineItems.text: The boss approves. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Geoffrey Ford
timelineItems.text: Jim Curtin dropping the F bomb on the comcast network. Yelling about "soccer fights" lmao 😂😂 too funny. JP Del is just like uhh #doop

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Tchani played a give-and-go to Francis, Tony's shot was deflected and Bernie was there to tap it in. 2-1 #Crew96

timelineItems.name: CrewSupportersUnion
timelineItems.text: That was probably offside, we'd feel bad but it's only Philly. Goalazo Columbus! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Matt Barnes
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 with a HUGE goal. Bernardo Anor from 1 foot from the goal line (maybe even offside) makes it 2-1 in the 90th minute

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Anor was PROBABLY in an offside position. And by "probably", I mean he was. But all that matters is the linesman didn't think so. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Raymon Gaddis (Philadelphia Union).

timelineItems.name: Rob
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 have had a good season and feel like they're going the right way on and off the field.

timelineItems.name: pink_fluffy_unicorn_nerds
timelineItems.text: Another goal #crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Danny Cruz (Philadelphia Union) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Maurice Edu.

timelineItems.name: Massive Report
timelineItems.text: 90' Cruz gets in behind the #Crew96 defense but his shot is scooped up by Clark.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Columbus Crew. Bernardo Anor tries a through ball, but Jairo Arrieta is caught offside.
Michael Lahoud (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Eric Gehrig (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Andrew Todd-Smith
timelineItems.text: 90'+4 #Freekick upcoming for Philly, could be the #Union's last gasp. #Crew96 have one more Maidana setpiece to defend. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bernardo Anor (Columbus Crew).
Sebastien Le Toux (Philadelphia Union) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: The U Match Day
timelineItems.text: FINAL: @ColumbusCrew 2, @PhilaUnion 1. Congrats to @zachpfeffer on his first @MLS goal! Recap to come. #CLBvPHI http://t.co/HjqH0S9FFO

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Columbus Crew 2, Philadelphia Union 1.

timelineItems.desc: The Columbus Crew win 2-1 over the Philadelphia Union with a late goal in their regular season finale before the playoffs.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Columbus Crew vs. Philadelphia Union | October 26, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Anor’s toe poke gives @ColumbusCrew the late winner: http://t.co/EeCSgWu7CK #CLBvPHI
